original_text: And they captured it on that day, and struck it with the edge of the sword. And he devoted every person in it to destruction that day, as he had done to Lachish.
korean_text: 그 날에 그 성읍을 취하고 칼날로 그것을 쳐서 그 중에 있는 모든 사람을 당일에 진멸하여 바쳤으니 라기스에 행한 것과 같았더라

sentences.original_text: And they captured it on that day
and struck it with the edge of the sword.
And he devoted every person in it to destruction that day
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 날 그 안의 모든 사람을 진멸했습니다

sentences.original_text: as he had done to Lachish.
